Package src.entities

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
src.entities.Customer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Client
public class Customer extends Object implements Client, Serializable
Represents a Customer/Movie-goer in the system Contains all relevant Customer's information such as name, age, username, password, mobile number, email, etc.
